changes.change: Fixed issues with manual skip. Should also of fixed issue with skip loops while casting to a Smart TV.
Added support for older YouTube versions. Fixed some bugs
Added support for newer YouTube versions. Fix string formatting issues
Bug fixes. Added toast when voting on segment
Fixed bug with edit start/end time options
Fixed settings button not showing in light mode
Fixed edit start time and edit end time options from not doing anything
Complete Rewrite. Tons of new features. For more info see the Reddit post on r/jailbreak
Fixed tweak from spamming network requests on videos without sponsorships
Fixed issues for videos with two sponsorships
